09fd31f785b0768c.voiceContent: The world of commerce is a battleground, and policy-making requires conviction and decisiveness.

8ca8b99bb8745210.voiceContent: Rest assured, I am not prone to misjudgment.

6dddd8eb89707842.voiceContent: After the decision is made, if you could please shred any documentation that accumulates on the wall during the process.

77d0962f35de06f1.voiceContent: Much like the days in the Jade Chamber...

f0b9a53e2bba0781.voiceContent: Haha... Ahh, you make me laugh.

ed06e2a113f14f84.voiceContent: Hmm, interesting... so many merchants and business magnates, vying to invite me to dinner.

72601c98d3a1ef15.voiceContent: And you wish to have a simple chat?

b3faf60db6f280fd.voiceContent: Or, to put it another way, I see this as the Jade Chamber that belongs to you.

cc75dfdf70cbf5a3.voiceContent: I like your boldness of spirit.

61d9fcbb8da10909.voiceContent: Which makes the prospect of a carefree, honest chat here with you... all the more valuable to me.

78e14beea74ceb5d.voiceContent: All that you have experienced during your travels is sure to imbue your policies with rare and valuable foresight.

b56b6ed4404049ba.voiceContent: For it is something that Mora cannot buy.

93179735fa41f2de.voiceContent: ...You really are quite different from the rest.

74854b02ee864c5f.voiceContent: The next time we have an important policy decision on our hands, I'd like you to get involved.

c28db0899a3c1e7b.voiceContent: A chat? Is there some commercial matter you wish to inquire about?

af6b09fc098d59c3.voiceContent: An environment can't be judged purely on its size or opulence.

b40b62c295908648.voiceContent: ...But all they're really after are my words... any morsel of information that may hint at Liyue's future commercial trends.

d8aa7c2f3115456c.voiceContent: Is there some matter of importance you wish to discuss with me?

f4e94825cebbddce.voiceContent: This is a comfortable environment, a good place to be calm and gather one's thoughts.

ba5ef3800f4444b4.voiceContent: If you encounter any difficulties on your travels, feel free to tell me all about them.

09fb3d1d7a21a5d8.voiceContent: As a matter of fact... there is something I've been planning for a while now.

0e46a0cac4241083.voiceContent: So, stay with me a while, and let's chat about the simpler things in life. Anything at all.

d7dd475661046841.voiceContent: Liyue is due another paper snowstorm. This time, you will be the one to change the prevailing weather.

735330aa7df4ee8f.voiceContent: These people... they send me the most extravagant gifts...

1eda690c6d58a6f6.voiceContent: Not exactly... I was thinking that you would be involved in the decision itself.

af8f3418e99515b6.voiceContent: Try to relax and enjoy yourself while you're here. Get some rest.

e8007d91843406c0.voiceContent: Please. Kindness has nothing to do with it.

61faa7843e937af7.voiceContent: The fount of knowledge and boldness of spirit that your travels have bequeathed upon you are sure to imbue your policies with rare and valuable foresight.

59f5d805888cbbfa.voiceContent: I sense the time and effort that you have put into this place, which reminds me of the time and effort I myself spent when constructing the Jade Chamber.

f7f0e92d7b440e95.voiceContent: The books here are considered quite rare. And those material catalogs from Mondstadt, hmm... perhaps they might provide some competitive market advantage.

36743d4b06aceb0e.voiceContent: I have observed Liyue from the Jade Chamber for years — every building and every tile is etched into my memory.

bcc18b5470b23d31.voiceContent: I cannot sense the slightest feeling of discord from this street... It is quite a rare find indeed.

7297af35bb936f04.voiceContent: If I had to say one thing, it would be that the decorations are a little simple. It wouldn't hurt to consider adding more... presentable articles of furniture.

379e315cb12ef6b0.voiceContent: Your ability never ceases to surprise me...

b4ff33ff04538d69.voiceContent: Director Hu... Good luck to us both.

44bb05f638074706.voiceContent: Thank you. It won't be long now...

cf501df782f0b704.voiceContent: Don't forget to come back here after Director Hu is done with you. There's a favor I would like to ask of you.

3d3077101ce3e995.voiceContent: The Wuwang Hill Disaster has always haunted me... Still, if Director Hu says the incidents are unrelated, I probably shouldn't pry any further...

44233811fca07089.voiceContent: The Gate of Fright can be found at Guyun Stone Forest, and the Gate of Injury is at The Chasm. Those are assigned to Beidou and Yelan.

96549e19048fedc8.voiceContent: As for the Gate of Terrain at Dihua Marsh, that's been taken by the Conqueror of Demons. These five are all on location already.

22e379e84c6dafb2.voiceContent: The Gate of Life is at Yilong Wharf, and the Gate of Concealment at Mt. Aocang. They are being seen to by Keqing and Ganyu respectively.

a4d6ebe0093b85fb.voiceContent: Heh, you want to drop by and say hello to them? Well, you'd better hurry if you want to make it back in time.

8d5e0b00e37e18fb.voiceContent: You have an update for me already?

3aedb942c0aeaf6c.voiceContent: Hehe, but of course. You don't need to teach me about work-life balance — I am no Keqing.

69168749b3cfcf17.voiceContent: It makes me wonder whether these events might somehow be connected on a deeper level.

a66bd339df67fa3d.voiceContent: I wouldn't dare touch Captain Beidou's Mora without final confirmation. What if you'd been speaking in jest? I'd never hear the end of it.

e7592551f72fa40e.voiceContent: I know you are well-informed, Captain. So I trust you are aware that recently, the nation of Natlan has recently endured some major events relating to the Ley Lines and to issues of life and death.

4c66b531b102353a.voiceContent: Well done... When did our straight-talking Captain learn to read between the lines, hmm?

665bd6f3fc70eb70.voiceContent: Now that you know the situation, are you willing to travel to the border and rescue Hu Tao and company? Your prior experience exploring that realm makes you our best hope.

b55f76d318890e2c.voiceContent: Then I'll wait here for the good news.

f57d02a185c97ef8.voiceContent: Time is limited, so I can't go into full detail, but let me give you a brief bit of background on the current situation.

b29b42345eae7a24.voiceContent: *sigh* That is what troubles me, too... Let's continue this discussion another time.

79a0c255e04f63e8.voiceContent: That's right. As for the remaining four gates, we are working to calculate their positions based on what we know of the array so far. It shouldn't take long now.

6531e2e251eedfce.voiceContent: Then, three days ago, Hu Tao came to us again, this time to update us that she was now ready to go to the border and investigate the situation in full.

2836acba26515dad.voiceContent: Beidou never passes on an opportunity to wisecrack at my expense.

bde27ed4b21a103e.voiceContent: I knew I could count on the great Captain Beidou to answer the call of duty.

b1721e22b42dd052.voiceContent: ...But if you have doubts, I would like to hear them.

1fb3a4b88cc05bc3.voiceContent: You can seek assistance from the Conqueror of Demons at Wangshu Inn. He will show you the way.

b95292c304b4e91c.voiceContent: Yelan clearly knows me well. She's brought you two here without me needing to say a word.

84c134984692eccf.voiceContent: Mm, but don't go putting your feet up just yet, Yelan... I'm afraid I have another mission for you.

773a5c9942699c79.voiceContent: One month ago, the Ministry of Civil Affairs became aware of an unusual illness affecting the elderly of Qingce.

5f07ae43953122c6.voiceContent: Keqing and Ganyu are handling the gates of Life and Concealment, and Captain Beidou has agreed to take the Crux Fleet to guard the Gate of Fright.

181d8cdce0ad49e1.voiceContent: That all goes without saying... unlike what I hope you're going to say next.

e6ef44da0e8f0ad7.voiceContent: A couple of weeks later, Director Hu came to report a potential disturbance in the border. The Ministry of Civil Affairs investigated, and sure enough, found an ominous presence on Wuwang Hill.

244390ca3a2582fd.voiceContent: This rescue mission is of the utmost importance. Director Hu must be brought back safe and sound.

cf4bdc4c617d6829.voiceContent: When I last saw Director Hu, she said that if worse comes to worst, activating the Seven-and-Eight-Gates Array may be our only option.

ca3e72c20bbfbdfa.voiceContent: Heh, Yelan was preparing to travel to the border herself before you two entered the picture. So naturally, he has been briefed on the situation.

f6dd0eb33079422a.voiceContent: I know you're looking for someone, and I don't wish to waste your time. So, I'll get right to the point.

138da0cb334822c7.voiceContent: Hah, the deal is sealed and then the trap is sprung... Well, you've got me now. So what about your share, hmm? How much will that rob me of?

e81930ebb91108f1.voiceContent: We had agreed to meet again yesterday, but she failed to show up. That's when I sent Yelan to investigate further.

0303d2a089f2c1e6.voiceContent: The gate array. We've now found the locations of the gates of Life, Concealment, Fright, and Injury.

e42b103b54b476af.voiceContent: That leaves the Gate of Injury. I've racked my brains, and other than the Conqueror of Demons, I can't think of anyone more suitable for this one than you.

7bca40aaefceb533.voiceContent: From what I understand, Director Hu Tao, Miss Qiqi, and Ms. Lan Yan are currently stranded inside... the border.

935082140a3a264f.voiceContent: The seventh is the Gate of Initiation, located here in Liyue Harbor. Lan Yan and I will see to this one.

73c1305e1596194e.voiceContent: Since we last met, we've seen an uptick in patient numbers in Liyue Harbor.

d8cdc03dcf66f77a.voiceContent: Keqing has already set out for the Gate of Life in Yilong Wharf, and Ganyu is en route to the Gate of Concealment at Mt. Aocang. Beidou is covering the Gate of Fright at Guyun Stone Forest, and Yelan will tackle the Gate of Injury at the Chasm.

74eb246fc01824f0.voiceContent: Since the gates are interconnected via the Ley Lines, the secret art will be amplified to all of Liyue. Not a single wisp of fetor will escape its grasp.

26acda58a4548361.voiceContent: Think nothing of it, Director Hu.

f6a87e677cb84271.voiceContent: Tonight, we will deploy the array, and set up a Homa Altar at each of the gates. This will enable the funeral parlor's secret art to incinerate the fetor.

78dd805fac42b9e0.voiceContent: Hehe, this is the one thing Director Hu's had to look forward to. Otherwise, she'd have set out for Wuwang Hill by now.

32d2de45fdccbc7d.voiceContent: As of last night, we confirmed the locations of the remaining four gates. The fifth is the Gate of Terrain at Dihua Marsh, which the Conqueror of Demons has pledged to defend.

2e42f23450679543.voiceContent: You needn't worry — they're all accounted for. Actually, we already knew the locations of the first four two days ago.

c3eec44edc3047ac.voiceContent: The sixth is the Gate of Repose in Qingce Village. This one has been claimed by the Bubu Pharmacy duo.

e607ecb7974e0a8a.voiceContent: Hehe, if I can't trust you, then I really don't know who I can turn to.

5adafed210fdb6a7.voiceContent: Yes. We've deduced the locations of four of the gates, and we should be able to pinpoint the rest of the array before long.

16176aa3861a4fdd.voiceContent: Do you believe that today's border crisis could have anything to do with the Wuwang Hill Disaster from over a decade ago?

6af41eaf56a1ca93.voiceContent: No apology necessary, Director Hu. It was my mistake letting you go to the border by yourself.

a73350ac647ddb0c.voiceContent: Excellent, well that puts my mind at ease. Everyone, let's meet here again in two days. We should know the locations of all the gates by then.

07476ae147805f41.voiceContent: Do you have any idea what the cause might be?

ae3590eac36deb40.voiceContent: I'd like to know, too. How dangerous is the situation we face? And how does it compare to previous cases?

bc134c9b57b63dda.voiceContent: No... There is something else that I'd like to ask about, but it might not be my place to do so. If you do not wish to answer, then please pretend I never said anything.

f7ba1a7e9eaf0665.voiceContent: Oh? Do you have any proof to back up this statement, Director Hu?

49b46085a66f0994.voiceContent: Several strokes of luck were involved. Our nation is blessed with good fortune.

ad0c5cd918ed259e.voiceContent: Ah yes, I've heard a little about the crisis there. But as far as I understand, the Night Kingdom is a true realm of the dead, while the border is more of a boundary world between life and death.

b31339be31fda65a.voiceContent: Everyone has agreed to the plan. Keqing, Ganyu, the Conqueror of Demons, Qiqi, Beidou, Yelan, Lan Yan, and I will each hold a rattan figure.

3f6b2d8d79ac4ea4.voiceContent: Is that so? Then perhaps this is simply the will of fate...

60abebb729e0c2a3.voiceContent: Basically... it looks likely that the obfuscation of one person is mandatory after all, because we can't violate the laws of the Ley Lines. Furthermore, the Gate of Death will be used to suppress the fetor this time... which is Director Hu's gate.

a40c49fbf3348e1e.voiceContent: Yes... The lantern display will begin soon.

d0ecf7e7df4d3e51.voiceContent: Today's Liyue draws its strength from unity. That is how we quelled an ancient god's wrath without the help of Rex Lapis, and that is why we cannot let the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor shoulder the present crisis alone.

c15f6785367b7835.voiceContent: How can this be? What's the problem?

a2c329e0ec2a6aae.voiceContent: Hehe, I never doubted that for a second.

4f2f9df022ad20d0.voiceContent: Nevertheless, the danger posed by the fetor is not to be underestimated. The consequences could be grave, even with everyone sharing the blast.

a5357e0d9db553c0.voiceContent: We must hope that we will be able to share the burden on Director Hu's shoulders... and we must have faith that she will return triumphant.

24808bd8a8ca95b7.voiceContent: We would like to request your assistance, but the choice is entirely yours. If you have any reservations, we will by no means—

fac0c162baac8e89.voiceContent: I believe it was a success, but...

a15bd7afb3fd1625.voiceContent: ...As we stand beneath this lantern-lit night sky, I would like to pay tribute to the ways of our forebears. We pray for the cleansing fire that exorcises evil... and for peace to prevail in our nation.

fabe8e5f5d03af2b.voiceContent: Ha, how daring. Snezhnaya's diplomats will answer for this afterward. Every last one.

b0d1560236921b3f.voiceContent: We can't have treasure unaccounted for.

0301f4093e804456.voiceContent: Wealth... why settle for less than more?

35d6555b11399817.voiceContent: Given the circumstances, I'm happy to help.

fed8d8e894143e00.voiceContent: I am Ningguang, Tianquan of Qixing. You wish to trade? You be my personal bodyguard, and I will show you how to get ahead in Liyue.

468f9b0ca1bee5fa.voiceContent: Even if an antique is priceless, the happiness it brings lasts for only the moment that you obtain it.

a094b914d024aafd.voiceContent: In a trade war, the perfect hunter leaves no trace.

31b09f1dae88362c.voiceContent: We should look for a new investment. Mora doesn't grow on trees.

becad4b103185ad8.voiceContent: Huh, it's raining. Fetch an umbrella for me, would you?

ab2807a39152666f.voiceContent: Nothing more than regular snowfall. One day I'll take you to see the snow that falls over Liyue.

9b23c34feef0409a.voiceContent: Calm weather? Do not trust your eyes. Your eyes can lie to you.

52f73eb04530251e.voiceContent: Gales like this can be the demise of fishermen, not to mention... Heh, never mind.

9781dd683edb38c2.voiceContent: Morning. Report your affairs, in order of priority.

5645a591e64314fe.voiceContent: Liuli Pavilion or Xinyue Kiosk. Which would you prefer to go to for lunch?

4fa6e0ef3ebd6688.voiceContent: The tea house has no more rooms? Then come, sit in the Jade Chamber... if you can afford the price.

3e9bfae1cfdce6b8.voiceContent: Sure. Go rest. If anything important comes up, I will be sure to send for you.

fdfbc3b862f294df.voiceContent: Be it simple price negotiation or a full-blown trade war, momentum and bargaining chips are but minor factors. To win, you need to be first to find out what cards your opponent is holding.

5a9fd946b48aaaa6.voiceContent: Come forward, stand beside me. Do you see the Jade Chamber? At first it was just a room, and now it clouds Liyue. When the time comes that it hangs above all of the seven nations, you shall stand by my side on that day too.

c20c5ae385b9aa6a.voiceContent: Your impressions of me have changed? Haha, well, at first I required your strength, so naturally I had to be as cordial as possible. But now that we are partners bound by contract, we may do away with such pretentious formalities.

1d156d5688c66d48.voiceContent: I suppose you've heard enough rumors about me. Hehe... What kind of person am I? I shall leave that for you to decide... Of course, your judgment will become a part of the rumor.

dc5d3b3e712ad58f.voiceContent: You've been with me for some time now. Have you learned to observe? Then observe me. Observe me right down to my very core.

810795463b795caf.voiceContent: There's no need to use a Vision in affairs that Mora can solve. As far as affairs only a Vision can solve go, I know of only one...

522054bdfd034edc.voiceContent: Gamblers always place their bets on the next dice roll... But the bankers always have the last laugh, and they never touch a single die.

87af165eca9a4666.voiceContent: In Liyue's ancient texts, there's no shortage of mentioning the beauty of the glaze lily, but in the modern era, the flower is on the brink of extinction. Now they can only be found in Yujing Terrace, and as such come with a hefty price tag.

b05034b41a5e8d13.voiceContent: That... captain. She clearly receives the adoration of many, but will always be the first to disregard the rules. The fines she has paid would be enough to buy her a whole new ship...

45fc06cea627407c.voiceContent: Perhaps you've never heard me speak like this. All that can be said has been said — both the good and the bad — but she still does as she pleases. Forget it. Keep Beidou out of my sight.

c35fa4e2efdd5088.voiceContent: Zhongli... Of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. He's very versed in a great deal of affairs. Although... such excellent pawns are of no use to me until I know their weaknesses.

4fbb4c0bb1a0a2b9.voiceContent: I presume you mean the girl whom Ganyu has taken under her wing. Do not worry, I have no plans to make this matter public. I am content to extend some leniency to the odd bit of mischievous maneuvering by that boat captain. One thing, though — Yaoyao seems to have become somewhat enamored with seafood lately. You should try to convince her to include some more fruits and vegetables in her diet.

ecd7f560d853292a.voiceContent: The Yuheng... She has changed a lot recently. But is Liyue better off with the Yuheng we have now, or the Yuheng we used to know? Only time will tell.

41afadccc93aa01f.voiceContent: The Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt, a strict and impeccable woman. Her flawless etiquette knows no fault, even her letters are meticulously written and creased according to the prescribed rules. It is such easily overlooked details that offer a glimpse into the true qualities of one's character.

bf255f273deba39a.voiceContent: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild. People like him can't stand the sight of me, which is only to be expected. I have no intention of troubling him either. Those who have different beliefs should not work together.

a549c93c67698e86.voiceContent: That girl from Wanmin Restaurant... Her suspicion towards me is always written all over her face... Hehe, I wonder what face she would make if only she knew how much I helped finance that restaurant...

ea77004b832c2bdb.voiceContent: One cannot afford to be overly reliant on others — even when it comes to Ganyu. There is a Liyue saying which goes, even the most meticulous can fall prey to happenstance. When there are important affairs to deal with, it is always safer to investigate and resolve them personally.

353f509a8dcf2e42.voiceContent: Seeing as it's you, there's no need to keep up the formalities. You can be a little more casual. But I still ask that you respect my time. If you have something to say, be concise — I have no time to waste.

8fb16ea2bc91c565.voiceContent: I've always believed that children are the most naive and innocent. The reports they give me are of the most value. So what about you? What will you have for me?

e1abb4a9c451c894.voiceContent: I've been thinking about something lately. If I were to keep you in Liyue, perhaps... at the right time, I might be able to leverage this city to... For now, it's mere conjecture. I should really consider whether the investment is worth it some more.

3be6c2b1f2e5025f.voiceContent: You can learn from me, and use Mora to make things a little easier for yourself. But remember, relationships built on Mora can only be relied on for a time. Hehe... and that is why I have never brought Mora into our relationship.

e63be0bb71b75cf6.voiceContent: This is truly a great investment. Sure, no Mora has been made from it, but the time I've spent with you is already a solid return. Haha, seems I win again — I put my money on the right person.

77da9bef9544593e.voiceContent: Care for a game of Liyue Millennial? It'll give me an opportunity to see exactly how good you are as a player.

eb882b7dcd0cad23.voiceContent: Concerns? If I told you of the concerns of the Liyue Qixing, do you think your shoulders could bear the burden? And, if you ever made the mistake of mentioning them to others...

57f6036a109ba881.voiceContent: A slow-boiled soup of leftover chicken and pork bones drenched over some cabbage leaves. I have few culinary requirements. Having a few staple dishes like this is enough.

0606ec350d9d6323.voiceContent: I've come across those who demand golden crab for every meal. Though it all seems so grandiose, I really have no desire for such frivolousness. If you're ever thinking of taking me out for such a dinner, you'd be better off just giving the Mora to me directly.

164f2c20e436af0e.voiceContent: Mmm... You have surpassed my expectations again.

339cf04e788fb334.voiceContent: With some things, if you haven't grasped the essentials, all the hard work in the world can go to waste... Know what I mean?

9056c217f870fd98.voiceContent: Ugh... It's the thought that counts.

7693f73ca8a777ad.voiceContent: There's no style in resorting to violence. It's simply the worst of all the bad decisions you could make.

453a5935b2cf5c2a.voiceContent: Cashing in time and Mora for power... Interesting. This shows their true value.

ca278b2d7224cf33.voiceContent: What is it that you hold so dear that is making you so persistent...? No, don't tell me. Give me more time to understand you myself.

b8ab7d666af19a60.voiceContent: I'm usually not so quick to place my trust in others, but it seems I will no longer be able to make such claims. You've done splendidly. If only I had more like you... No, perhaps... you alone are enough.

2ef3b0b997272f0b.voiceContent: Is this the end of Tianquan?

1437d4cf193c3b2b.voiceContent: Yanfei? I suppose you could say she's a dear rival of mine... Were she not so deft at explaining the meanders of the law and providing her clients with all sorts of cunning suggestions, it would take me many more months to identify existing loopholes in the legal codices and tighten them one by one.

aa14763ac86ac3ce.voiceContent: Yun Jin... Are you able to appreciate her performances? It might be difficult at first, but I would encourage you to give it a chance. The reason I decided to invest into her opera troupe is quite simple Elegant art forms like these deserve to be passed down to future generations.

5c34d4e1066849bc.voiceContent: How is Miss Shenhe doing as of late? Please, look out for her whenever you can. I am most grateful to both of you for your assistance with rebuilding the Jade Chamber. Ahem, and on a more personal note — please know that if you are ever free, a cup of the finest tea will always be waiting for you here.

28f43cd0ee858b32.voiceContent: She's a very interesting character. I can say with the utmost confidence that she is someone I trust unreservedly. She handles herself impeccably, which means she stays beyond reproach. Hehe, since you both have high intelligence in common, hopefully you will get along very well.

64a68263a1e3a3b7.voiceContent: The departure of Rex Lapis will be no small test for both the Qixing and the city of Liyue. Seldom has any matter kept me tossing and turning at night like recent events.Nevertheless, I shall not lose sight of my goal. There will come a day when the shadow cast by the Jade Chamber reaches every end of Teyvat.

232aa08e1d6f1491.voiceContent: Mmm... You have surpassed my expectations again.

a52f52c089e2f1f7.voiceContent: With some things, if you haven't grasped the essentials, all the hard work in the world can go to waste... Know what I mean?

bf7134cbf10d8d3d.voiceContent: Ugh... It's the thought that counts.

97da0b1ffae6c5c3.voiceContent: Hmm, there seems to be quite a market for this... Ahem, never mind. Let's get ready, and start the game.

8c84f68aa508b6b8.voiceContent: You look like you want a rematch... Hehe, perhaps another time.

12dd2c44bc375537.voiceContent: You should prepare more adequately next time.

9b5160521e470424.voiceContent: One wrong move is all it takes...

d0a9b6ed5227a9c0.voiceContent: The victor is clear. Seems you require more practice.

5839c3d3bd8bf6c0.voiceContent: Very well, go about your business. Take care.

7d4f24d49fb77527.voiceContent: You wish to play against me? I accept.

911fca4cff972a2e.voiceContent: You played the hand you were dealt masterfully. Commendable.
